answers.answer: Both type 1 and type 2 diabetes have genetic links.  there is no certainty.You dont say what type of diabetes your parents have.

Here's an expert answer to that question from MedHelp.org and the Sugar Sense app. You can find this in the app by clicking the menu bar in the upper left and selecting Health Guide, then navigating to the Expert Answers section.http://www.medhelp.org/diabetes/articles/Will-My-Baby-Inherit-Diabetes/1744

question: Both of my parents have diabetes.  I am concerned that I may have it one day too.
title: If both parents have diabetes how likely am I to have it?
